document_data.name: Guards Court
document_data.mainbody: '''Guards Court''' was a hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]] paved cul-de-sac in the southern section of the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography:
[[File:Crossbow-Guard-Hillock-Niles CS-map.png|thumb|273px|''A portion of a [[1492 DR]] map, showing an unlabeled Guards Court running southeast off of High Hillock Lane.'']]
This cul-de-sac originally stretched south off of [[Niles Way]], ending in a dead-end block of buildings that were bounded by [[Crossbow Lane]], Niles Way, and [[Snail Street]].Guards Court is not labeled on the map included with ''[[Waterdeep: Dragon Heist]]''
